pages.text: $(item)Danger Blox$() are, well... $(thing)Dangerous$(). These $(blox)Blox$() when stepped on $(thing)without boots$() or hit with your tools or fists will $(thing)deal damage$() to you, slowly but surely. Similar to a Cactus, will they $(lissa)destroy any thrown Blocks or Items$(), that touches them. They can be found in the world, usually around these $(l:kingdomkeys:blox/prize)star shaped Blox$(), or crafted using $(l:kingdomkeys:blox/normal)Normal Blox$() and $(thing)Cacti$().
